title: Why hasn't Death Recap been fixed?
body: I don't think y'all have hired very good people, you are being too nice.

replies.body: They've stated that out of all the things they are working out, Death Recap is one of the lowest priority things, it was in one of those "Ask Riot" articles they were doing
It's proof they are bad at making games imo.

> [{quoted}](name=t4JxNr2gszz,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9Wj1NfNu,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-06-23T18:28:40.267+0000)
>
> It's proof they are bad at making games imo.

LoL was the #1 game from 2010-2017.

 Not exactly a bad game, and a VERY good lifespan of a game.
We wouldn't be able to laugh at the ridiculous/hilarious things it tells us. It will be somewhat of a loss when it is (or IF it is) eventually fixed.
It's not Yasuo so it doesn't need buffed
